name: workout-tracker
description: workout-tracker is a self-hosted fitness log designed for detailed exercise tracking. It records exercises, sets, reps, and notes, and visualizes performance trends through straightforward dashboards.
features: Exercise logging: Record detailed workout data including exercises, sets, reps, weight, and duration.
Custom exercises: Add your own exercises with names, descriptions, and muscle group classifications.
Workout templates: Save frequently used workout routines as templates for quick session starts.
Performance analytics: View charts and statistics showing strength progression and training volume over time.
Body measurements: Track weight, body fat percentage, and other metrics alongside workout data.
Calendar view: See workout history in a calendar format to identify patterns and rest days.
Personal bests: Automatically detect and highlight new personal records for each exercise.
Workout notes: Attach notes to sessions to record how you felt, injuries, or training adjustments.
Multi-user support: Allow multiple users to maintain separate workout logs on one installation.
Data import: Import workout history from CSV files or other fitness tracking applications.
Goal setting: Define fitness goals and track progress toward targets like total volume or frequency.
Export reports: Generate PDF or CSV reports of workout history for sharing with trainers or analysis.
